data.text: @erstkate I am going to be so very sad when he passes, so will my Paul who is also a very big fan, I sent him to watch Billy's farewell gig down here for his birthday 2 years ago and he says it's hands down the best birthday present he's ever had. Cost me a fortune, worth it tho.

@erstkate yeah, this made me so incredibly sad, I have loved him since I saw him on an early Parkinson interview, and I nearly wet myself laughing. I have a few of his live shows on DVD and he can always make me feel better. This just sucks do so much.
@erstkate All of the dementia diseases are just bad. And to not have the use of one's mind, how terribly sad!!
